Parameters: List: list containing the results of @B_android#media#AudioManager#getActivePlaybackConfigurations_E@.
onPlaybackConfigChanged(java.util.List<a.Description: Called whenever the playback activity and configuration has changed.

ClassDesc: Interface for receiving update notifications about the playback activity on the system. Extend this abstract class and register it with @B_android#media#AudioManager#registerAudioPlaybackCallback_E@ to be notified. Use @B_android#media#AudioManager#getActivePlaybackConfigurations_E@ to query the current configuration.
